name: Generate App Summary
description: Updates app summaries when app files change

action.message:
An app file was modified. Please update the app summary:

1. Identify which app was changed (Haunted Tasks or Coven CRM)
2. Update or create APP_SUMMARY.md in that app's directory with:
   - Brief description (2-3 sentences)
   - Main features list
   - Key pages/routes
   - Commands to run (dev, build, seed)
   - Tech stack used

Keep it concise and useful for developers.
